original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāra gire bhesakaḷā vane migadāye

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kokanade pāsāde sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kokanade pāsāde sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antara ghare chaḍḍenti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antara ghare chaḍḍessanti sā iyyathā api gihī kāma bhoginā iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhū sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antaraghare chaḍḍessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhū sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antara ghare chaḍḍenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma te bhikkhave mogha purisāḥ sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antara ghare chaḍḍessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Na sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antaraghare chaḍḍessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
na sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antara ghare

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antaraghare chaḍḍeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍeti,
analyzed: uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍeti
